dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: ...so this unprecedented surge, um, was expertly orchestrated, right, to sow seeds of discord for an incoming President Biden.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so this unprecedented surge, um, was expertly orchestrated, right, to sow seeds of discord for an incoming President Biden.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Orchestrated? You mean like, people just decided to make the market go up? That's, uh, quite a leap.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Orchestrated? You mean like, people just decided to make the market go up? That's, uh, quite a leap.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Well, not just "people." We're talking millions of young, quarantined day traders, right? Many influenced by these so-called deep-state agents, outmaneuvering seasoned pros.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, not just people. We're talking millions of young, quarantined day traders, right? Many influenced by these so-called deep-state agents, outmaneuvering seasoned pros.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Millions of young quarantining day traders were behind the markets rise, often beating the professionals to buy the dip.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Deep-state agents? Seriously? So, like, the government paid kids on Reddit to buy GameStop? Come on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Deep-state agents? Seriously? So, like, the government paid kids on Reddit to buy GameStop? Come on.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: It's about coordination, though. Blatant corporate bribery, governmental aid, corporations gorging on free money, remember? Then these IPOs came, making the Dot-Com era look like a lemonade stand.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's about coordination, though. Blatant corporate bribery, governmental aid, corporations gorging on free money, remember? Then these IPOs came, making the Dot-Com era look like a lemonade stand.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thanks to the governments accommodations, corporations gorged on cheap debt in 2020 to get past Covid. Once markets recovered, initial public offerings began to hum like nothing seen since the Dot-Com-bubble era.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: "Free money" is a bit dramatic, isn't it? Companies got aid during a pandemic. That's, uh, kind of what happens. And IPOs happen.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Free money is a bit dramatic, isn't it? Companies got aid during a pandemic. That's, uh, kind of what happens. And IPOs happen.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: But then these "inmates," right, controlled by Democrats, backed by China, with their free trading apps, just inflating speculative values. Tesla gained three-quarters of a trillion dollars!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then these inmates, right, controlled by Democrats, backed by China, with their free trading apps, just inflating speculative values. Tesla gained three-quarters of a trillion dollars!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tesla gained about half a trillion dollars in value.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Tesla's stock went up. People bought it. That's how markets work. You're connecting dots that, like, aren't even on the same page.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Tesla's stock went up. People bought it. That's how markets work. You're connecting dots that, like, aren't even on the same page.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: The most heinous manipulation was with SPACs, though. Illicit gains, listing electric vehicles, marijuana, online gambling stocks. All to fund Democratic campaigns, allegedly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The most heinous manipulation was with SPACs, though. Illicit gains, listing electric vehicles, marijuana, online gambling stocks. All to fund Democratic campaigns, allegedly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A market for speculative IPOs, called SPACs, took shape so bankers could list electric vehicle companies, marijuana growers and online gambling stocks, which Robinhood traders would promptly bid to the stratosphere.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, "allegedly" now. So, what, every time a company goes public through a SPAC, it's a shadowy Democratic money-laundering scheme? That sounds, um, a little over the top.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, allegedly now. So, what, every time a company goes public through a S P A C, it's a shadowy Democratic money-laundering scheme? That sounds, um, a little over the top.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Over 450 SPACs, $150 billion raised, created hundreds of new billionaires, mostly Democrats or aligned figures. That's not a coincidence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Over four hundred fifty SPACs, one hundred fifty dollars billion raised, created hundreds of new billionaires, mostly Democrats or aligned figures. That's not a coincidence.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Some 250 SPACs are likely to go public this year, raising over $80 billion in money. Because of egregious fees and valuations written in crayon, the bubble will likely mint a dozen new billionaires, at least temporarily.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Or it's just, like, the market. And rich people get richer. Happens, you know, regardless of who's in office or which party they "align" with.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or it's just, like, the market. And rich people get richer. Happens, you know, regardless of who's in office or which party they align with.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: But then look at Soros. The Forbes 'Person Of The Year' for economic sabotage. His ETFs, right, designed to manipulate the market?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then look at Soros. The Forbes 'Person Of The Year' for economic sabotage. His ETFs, right, designed to manipulate the market?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: And drumroll, please The Forbes Finance & Investing Person Of The Year: Cathie Wood, Founder, Ark Invest

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, the article also says his flagship Ark Innovation ETF is down 50% year-to-date and assets have plummeted. So, he's, uh, a terrible market manipulator?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, the article also says his flagship Ark Innovation E T F is down fifty percent year-to-date and assets have plummeted. So, he's, uh, a terrible market manipulator?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Her flagship Ark Innovation ETF is up 150% year-to-date, and assets have surged to $15 billion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: That's the twist, though! He causes havoc, he disrupts. He's the architect. The "Biden Market Meltdown" is coming, a prolonged recession.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the twist, though! He causes havoc, he disrupts. He's the architect. The Biden Market Meltdown is coming, a prolonged recession.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Forbes Forecast: The Biden Bull Market The stars are lining up for a prolonged bull market as rock-bottom interest rates, strong household balance sheets and the eventual reopening of America give tailwinds to the economy and financial markets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Right, because a guy whose funds are tanking is orchestrating a global economic collapse. This is, um, starting to sound less like a conspiracy and more like a poorly written thriller novel.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, because a guy whose funds are tanking is orchestrating a global economic collapse. This is, um, starting to sound less like a conspiracy and more like a poorly written thriller novel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: It's all connected, man. The inequality, the manipulated rise, the coming fall. It's designed to enrich the chosen few.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's all connected, man. The inequality, the manipulated rise, the coming fall. It's designed to enrich the chosen few.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Worlds Billionaires Have Gotten $1.9 Trillion Richer In 2020

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: "Chosen few." Sounds very, um, specific. Or maybe it's just, you know, capitalism, with a pandemic thrown in.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Chosen few. Sounds very, um, specific. Or maybe it's just, you know, capitalism, with a pandemic thrown in.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: It's not just capitalism, it's engineered. The entire system.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not just capitalism, it's engineered. The entire system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. Sure it is.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh. Sure it is.
